set.name: Devilsaur Armor
set.bonus: (2) Set: Improves your chance to hit by 2%.

set.name: Dal'Rend's Arms
set.bonus: (2) Set: +50 Attack Power.

set.name: Black Dragon Mail
set.bonus: (2) Set: Improves your chance to hit by 1%.
(3) Set: Improves your chance to get a critical strike by 2%.
(4) Set: +10 Fire Resistance.

set.name: Bloodsoul Embrace
set.bonus: (3) Set: Restores 12 mana per 5 sec.

set.name: The Twin Blades of Hakkari
set.bonus: (2) Set: Increased Swords +6.

set.name: The Highlander's Resolution
set.bonus: (2) Set: +5 Stamina.
(3) Set: Improves your chance to get a critical strike by 1%.

set.name: The Defiler's Resolution
set.bonus: (2) Set: +5 Stamina.
(3) Set: Improves your chance to get a critical strike by 1%.

set.name: Lieutenant Commander's Battlearmor
set.bonus: (2) Set: +40 Attack Power.
(4) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.
(6) Set: +20 Stamina.

set.name: Field Marshal's Battlegear
set.bonus: (2) Set: +20 Stamina.
(4) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.
(6) Set: +40 Attack Power.

set.name: Champion's Battlearmor
set.bonus: (2) Set: +40 Attack Power.
(4) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.
(6) Set: +20 Stamina.

set.name: Warlord's Battlegear
set.bonus: (2) Set: +20 Stamina.
(4) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.
(6) Set: +40 Attack Power.

set.name: Battlegear of Unyielding Strength
set.bonus: (3) Set: -2 rage cost to Intercept.

set.name: Conqueror's Battlegear
set.bonus: (3) Set: Decreases the rage cost of all Warrior shouts by 35%.
(5) Set: Increase the Slow effect and damage of Thunder Clap by 50%.

set.name: Emblems of Veiled Shadows
set.bonus: (3) Set: -10 energy cost for your Slice and Dice ability.

set.name: Nightslayer Armor
set.bonus: (3) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish ability by 30 sec.
(5) Set: Increases your maximum Energy by 10.
(8) Set: Heals the rogue for 500 when Vanish is performed.

set.name: Bloodfang Armor
set.bonus: (3) Set: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 5%.
(5) Set: Improves the threat reduction of Feint by 25%.
(8) Set: Gives the Rogue a chance to inflict 283 to 318 damage on the target and heal the Rogue for 50 health every 1 sec. for 6 sec. on a melee hit.

set.name: Deathdealer's Embrace
set.bonus: (3) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Evasion ability by -1 min.
(5) Set: 15% increased damage to your Eviscerate ability.

set.name: Bonescythe Armor
set.bonus: (2) Set: Your normal melee swings have a chance to Invigorate you, healing you for 90 to 111.
(4) Set: Your Backstab, Sinister Strike, and Hemorrhage critical hits cause you to regain 5 energy.
(6) Set: Reduces the threat from your Backstab, Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage, and Eviscerate abilities.
(8) Set: Your Eviscerate has a chance per combo point to reveal a flaw in your opponent's armor, granting a 100% critical hit chance for your next Backstab, Sinister Strike, or Hemorrhage.

set.name: Trappings of the Unseen Path
set.bonus: (3) Set: Increases your pet's damage by 3%.

set.name: Giantstalker Armor
set.bonus: (3) Set: Increases the range of your Mend Pet spell by 50% and the effect by 10%. Also reduces the cost by 30%.
(5) Set: Increases your pet's stamina by 30 and all spell resistances by 40.
(8) Set: Increases the damage of Multi-shot and Volley by 15%.

set.name: Dragonstalker Armor
set.bonus: (3) Set: Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Aspect of the Hawk by 20%.
(5) Set: Increases your pet's stamina by 40 and all spell resistances by 60.

(8) Set: You have a chance whenever you deal ranged damage to apply an Expose Weakness effect to the target. Expose Weakness increases the Ranged Attack Power of all attackers against that target by 450 for 7 sec.

set.name: Striker's Garb
set.bonus: (3) Set: Reduces the cost of your Arcane Shots by 10%.
(5) Set: Reduces the cooldown of your Rapid Fire by 2 minutes.

set.name: Cryptstalker Armor
set.bonus: (2) Set: Increases the duration of your Rapid Fire by 4 secs.
(4) Set: Increases Attack Power by 50 for both you and your pet.
(6) Set: Your ranged critical hits cause an Adrenaline Rush, granting you 50 mana.
(8) Set: Reduces the mana cost of your Multi-Shot and Aimed Shot by 20.
